The second episode of Half Life 2 is a fun and longer experience than the first episode. The environments were more interesting and varied. The ending is a massive cliffhanger and it's sad to know there is no more HF2 after this. Overall a good continuation with more gameplay and plot.

The last part of Half-Life 2 franchise. It's still as good as previous games. In this part Valve added new entities such as hunter for instance. It makes game much more interesting to play. So, don't waste your time. Go for it.

Alyx: "Not sure what I did, but it worked"
Gordon: <Came this close to break his silence vow>

It starts with one
One thing I don't know why
It doesn't even matter how hard you try
Keep that in mind, I designed this rhyme
To explain in due time

All I know
Time is a valuable thing
Watch it fly by as the pendulum swings
Watch it count down to the end of the day
The clock ticks life away

It's so unreal

It's so unreal, didn't look out below
Watch the time go right out the window
Trying to hold on, but didn't even know
I wasted it all just to watch you go

Watch you go

I kept everything inside and even though I tried, it all fell apart
What it meant to me will eventually be a memory of a time when I tried so hard

I tried so hard
And got so far
But in the end
It doesn't even matter
I had to fall
To lose it all
But in the end
It doesn't even matter

One thing, I don't know why
It doesn't even matter how hard you try
Keep that in mind, I designed this rhyme
To remind myself how I tried so hard

I tried so hard

In spite of the way you were mocking me
Acting like I was part of your property
Remembering all the times you fought with me
I'm surprised it got so far

Got so far

Things aren't the way they were before
You wouldn't even recognize me anymore
Not that you knew me back then
But it all comes back to me in the end

In the end

You kept everything inside and even though I tried, it all fell apart
What it meant to me will eventually be a memory of a time when I tried so hard

I tried so hard
And got so far
But in the end
It doesn't even matter
I had to fall
To lose it all
But in the end
It doesn't even matter

I've put my trust in you
Pushed as far as I can go
For all this
There's only one thing you should know

Pushed as far as I can go
For all this
There's only one thing you should know

I tried so hard
And got so far
But in the end
It doesn't even matter
I had to fall

But in the end
It doesn't even matter

думаю никто в свое первое прохожденю не пытался выпонить ачивку с гномом. я тоже не пытался для меня это 4-5 прохождение,но как у меня бомбило.Машина? ДА ХРЕН ТАМ ПЛАВАЛ. ТАЩИ ГНОМА В РУКАХ 3 ГЛАВЫ ПОДРЯД. Нормальные перестрелки? НЕТ. ОДНО ПОПАДАНИЕ РЯДОМ С ГНОМОМ И ОН ЛЕТИТ ПРЯМИКОМ В АД ДЛЯ ГНОМОВ. у меня пройдена на высочайшей сложности RTCS,wolf2009,HALO2,3,4. но не в одной из этих игр у меня так не бомбило(ачивка выполнялась на СРЕДНЕМ уровне сложности). теперь я ненавижу гномов.
this deserves a sequel not a VR prequel.

This game really leaves an impact on you. The ending (despite being retconned) is still amazing!

Can't believe I just played this for the first time in 2022. For some reason I had thought I'd already beaten it back when I used to play Half Life and Half Life 2 as a teenager. 5/5 but wish it was longer, of course.
Played through the main series for the first time and loved it! A bit challenging at times but the story holds water well!
Please, Valve. I'm crying after that ending. You can't just cut it off like that. PLEASE! Make episode 3. I'm begging you.
Half Life 2 eben. Einer der besten Shooter überhaupt

Holy crap that ending...
Overall this series was really good and I can't believe Valve just left it in the dust. It is an unresolved storyline left on a cliffhanger, just give us the ending PLEASE.

Here are my thoughts on the ones I have played:
Half life 1: 6/10
Opposing Forces: 8/10
Blue Shift: 7/10
Half life 2: 9/10
Episode 1: 7/10
Episode 2: 8.5/10

While overrated, it is still a very good franchise and I hate that Valve is constantly giving fans the middle finger.

Pra mim, foi um dos melhores jogos que eu já conheci e amei na vida. Lembro como se fosse ontem: eu passando horas, dias e meses lendo as historias e teorias dessa franquia, que é do mesmo universo de Portal 1 e 2. Só lamento pela Valve nunca ter lançado o Episode Tree como tinha prometido...

Super recomendo

Back on form, back in a vehicle as well, but the story and the pacing more than make up for it. Compared to HL2 it's much shorter, which makes the driving sections feel more organic IMO. If you don't value your sanity, you can always try to get the garden gnome to the rocket.
I mean there's nothing I can say that hasn't already been said. Go play all the half life games so you can play this one.

Ending was very tragic. How could these bots come so easily and do their business?
